name: Way of the Drunken Master
description: Monks who emulate the unpredictable sway of a drunkard to bewilder foes.

3.name: Bonus Proficiencies
3.description: Gain proficiency in Performance and brewer's supplies if you don't already have them.

3.name: Drunken Technique
3.description: When you use Flurry of Blows, you gain the benefit of the Disengage action and your walking speed increases by 10 feet for the current turn.

6.name: Tipsy Sway
6.description: Stand up from prone using only 5 feet of movement and spend 1 ki point as a reaction to redirect a missed melee attack to another creature within 5 feet of you.

11.name: Drunkard's Luck
11.description: Spend 2 ki points to cancel disadvantage on an ability check, attack roll, or saving throw.

17.name: Intoxicated Frenzy
17.description: When you use Flurry of Blows, make up to three additional attacks provided each targets a different creature.
